article: syria on saturday accused israel of sponsoring state terrorism against muslims in the middle east and called on islamic countries worldwide to formally condemn the first israeli attack on syrian soil in three decades .
abstract: syria urges islamic countries to condemn israeli attack with bc-as-gen oic-islamic summit
